page.title: 07Communications in Alresford.
page.content: Alresord is well supplied with postal services, a well stocked post office is situated adjacent to the railway line which provides a direct line to the huge sorting office in Colchester, which too is next to the station. This situation enables a quick efficient service. The Post Office provides a country car which is a car that takes letters to small villages and in doing so provides a means of transport for a limited number of people. There are good road connections in and around the area with a main road to Colchester in one direction and Clacton in the other. Trains link with Clacton and the Colchester town stations.
